oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Arnold, G. W., 1925 February 24
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Arnold, G. W., dated February 19th, 1925. Illustrates the first page of the document. Arnold’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on February 24th, 1925. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Arnold family
